org.openimaj.ml.training

Interface IncrementalTrainer<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type being trained on
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnnotatorFaceRecogniser, AudioAnnotator, EigenFaceRecogniser, FaceRecogniser, FeatureCachingIncrementalBatchAnnotator, FisherFaceRecogniser, IncrementalAnnotator, InstanceCachingIncrementalBatchAnnotator, KNNAnnotator, NaiveBayesAnnotator, NaiveBayesSentimentAnnotator

    public interface IncrementalTrainer<T>
    Interface describing objects capable of performing incremental training.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void reset()
      Reset the object to its initial condition, as if it hasn't seen any training data.
      void train(Iterable<? extends T> data)
      Train the object with the given data.
      void train(T annotated)
      Train/update object using a new instance.

    • Method Detail

      • train

        void train(Iterable<? extends T> data)
        Train the object with the given data.
        Parameters:
        data - the training data

      • train

        void train(T annotated)
        Train/update object using a new instance.
        Parameters:
        annotated - instance to train with

      • reset

        void reset()
        Reset the object to its initial condition, as if it hasn't seen any training data.
